title: Bugs Bunny's hare-raising tales
brief_description: Bugs Bunny is everybody’s favourite, no matter what your age. His whimsical humour and crazy adventures are timeless and this Warner Bros compilation of six much-loved classic cartoons is certain to provide some entertaining laughs. Watch out for the Errol Flynn cameo along with appearances by the Big Bad Wolf, the Three Little Pigs and Josemite Sam.
